entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain or freezing rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to periods of rain this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Local rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:39 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers at times heavy. Temperature rising to 14 by morning.
